sentences.english: When he cometh the solitary places shall be glad.
sentences.chinese: 當他來時，孤苦之地必成歡愉。

sentences.english: Ars erotica is the theme of discussion.
sentences.chinese: 歡愉的藝術是討論的主題。

sentences.english: Sing and dance together and be joyous, but let each one of you be alone.
sentences.chinese: 兩人一起歡歌曼舞，同享歡愉，但仍要各自保持自我。

sentences.english: Wish you and your family a very happy new year.
sentences.chinese: 祝願您及全家新年歡愉。

sentences.english: The joy of a morning in spring, the faith of a mustard seed.
sentences.chinese: 春日清晨的歡愉，芥末種子的信誠。

sentences.english: When you give up something for something that does not bring immediate joy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你捨棄的東西並沒有給你帶來半點的歡愉。

sentences.english: You have exalted the right hand of his foes, have gladdened all his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 你高舉了他仇人的右手，使他的敵人都滿心歡愉。

sentences.english: a happy new year from all of your students.
sentences.chinese: 祝您新年歡愉，您的全體學生敬上。

sentences.english: i'm so happy with you in this starry night.
sentences.chinese: 在這繁星閃灼的夜晚，跟你在一路很是歡愉。

sentences.english: “We’ll make love by candlelight,” she said.
sentences.chinese: 她說:“我們將在燭光中盡享二人歡愉。”

sentences.english: A good at relax pressure , strengthen confidence and have a good effect on restraining frigidity.
sentences.chinese: 放鬆效果絕佳，使人歡愉，增強自信，改善性冷淡。

sentences.english: For summer and his pleasures wait on thee.
sentences.chinese: 只因夏之歡愉既已委身於你。

sentences.english: Now let my happiness sings inside my dream.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我歡愉的歌聲藏匿在我的夢中。

sentences.english: A party is in progress, and Hoffmann mockingly praises the pleasures of the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼處身於宴會中，以戲謔的口吻感嘆肉體的歡愉。

sentences.english: May sess and happiness follow you throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 願今年景功和歡愉與你相伴。

definition: singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
